title: Election 2016 exit polls : percentage of votes by gender
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Sexs on X-axis for 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Percentage of votes.
In Sex Female, Hillary Clinton had the highest Percentage of votes 54.0 among the 2 groups and in Male, Hillary Clinton had the lowest Percentage of votes 41.0.
In Sex Female, Hillary Clinton had the maximum Percentage of votes and it saw the lowest in Sex Male out of all 2 Sexs.
The maximum Percentage of votes for Hillary Clinton that was found in Sex Female was 1.32 times larger than the minimum Percentage of votes observed in Sex Male.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Percentage of votes on the Y-axis for 2 different Sexs for 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Hillary Clinton had the highest Percentage of votes in Sex Female and Hillary Clinton had the lowest Percentage of votes in Sex Male.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Sexs on X-axis for 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Percentage of votes.
In Sex Female, Hillary Clinton had the highest Percentage of votes 54.0 among the 2 groups and in Male, Hillary Clinton had the lowest Percentage of votes 41.0.
In Sex Female, Hillary Clinton had the maximum Percentage of votes and it saw the lowest in Sex Male out of all 2 Sexs.
The maximum Percentage of votes for Hillary Clinton that was found in Sex Female was 1.32 times larger than the minimum Percentage of votes observed in Sex Male.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Percentage of votes on the Y-axis for 2 different Sexs for 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Hillary Clinton had the highest Percentage of votes in Sex Female and Hillary Clinton had the lowest Percentage of votes in Sex Male.
In Sex Female, Hillary Clinton had the maximum Percentage of votes and it saw the lowest in Sex Male out of all 2 Sexs.
The maximum Percentage of votes for Hillary Clinton that was found in Sex Female was 1.32 times larger than the minimum Percentage of votes observed in Sex Male.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Percentage of votes was found in case of Hillary Clinton.
On average, the Sex Female had the highest Percentage of votes for all 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump. Whereas Male had the lowest average Percentage of votes.
